credit_line: Museum purchase from James B. Ford and Peter Cooper Hewitt Estate Funds
title: First Studies for Villa Stein-de Monzie, Garches, France
provenance: Le Corbusier (Charles Edouard Jeanneret-Gris), prior to 1936
medium: Graphite on white paperboard, mounted on canvas
description: Four drawings for Villa Stein-de Monzie, at Garches, France: facade elevation view at upper left, rear elevation view at upper right, facade aerial perspective at center, left, rear aerial perspective at lower, right.
name: Drawing
